english.segment1: I cried out to God with my voice. And he gave ear to me. In the day of my trouble. He comforted me. So because you love me. Faithfully. And you alone are worthy
english.segment2: (chorus). I, I love thee. I stretch out to thee. Oh Oh lord. I bow before thee. Oh, Oh lord. I give myself to you, completely. OOOhh OHhhh Yeah. Ohhh.Ohhh
english.segment3: I will now and forever. Sing with joy unto my God. Because of your wisdom. You sent your only son. Because you want whats best for me. I will love you faithfully. and you alone are worthy
english.segment4: . Ohh lord. I stretch out too thee. Ohh lord. I bow before thee. Ohh lord. I give myself to you, completely. OOOhh OHhhh. Ohhh
english.segment5: Oh lord my God, who alone is wise. Be glory and majesty. I come before you, with joy. Lets sing. I worship, you. In beauty of your holiness
english.segment6: Oh, oh lord, I stretch out to thee. Oh, Oh lord. I bow before thee. Oh, Oh lord. I give myself to you, completely. OOOhh OHhhh Yeah. Ohhh.Ohhh
